Steps.Message: Power cut alert! This is UK Power Networks. Sorry if your power has gone off again. We are aware there is an underlying issue causing the recent power cuts. If your power is not off then you're not currently affected by this outage. If your electricity is off, you can get live updates on our power cut map at http://www.ukpowernetworks.co.uk/power-cut/map?incidentid=[INCIDENTID]. If you need extra help or support, or just want to speak to us, call us on 105.

We became aware of a power cut at 20:39. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
